description: These delicious cinnamon and raisin bagels are easier than you would think to make and are a perfect breakfast choice.
keywords: Bagel,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg,Sesame free,Baking,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Cinnamon & Raisin Bagels Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Mix the flour, sugar, salt, yeast, raisins and cinnamon in a large bowl. Make a well in the centre and pour in 300ml of warm water. Mix to form a dough.

Tip the dough on to a lightly floured work surface and knead for 6-7 minutes until stretchy and smooth. Place in an oiled bowl, cover with a damp tea towel and leave to rise for 1 hour, until doubled in size.

Knock back the dough and knead for 2-3 minutes. Divide into 8 balls, make a hole in the centre of each with your finger and place on an oiled baking sheet. Cover with a damp towel and leave to rise for 30 minutes.

Bring a large pan of water to the boil and drop each bagel in, cooking for 30 seconds on each side. Remove, drain well and place on a lined baking sheet. Brush the bagels with egg yolk and bake for 15-20 minutes until golden.
